item.title: Cricket have tough time at BUCS Indoor Tournament
item.author: James Musgrave,
item.description: Imperial took a squad of seven to Edgbaston, Birmingham on Sunday with genuine hopes of progressing from the semi-final of the BUCS men’s indoor tournament, despite a tough draw of Loughborough and Coventry Universities. Having been asked to bat, it soon became apparent that it was going to be a …
